source.77e1bafc:
def lower_outliers(x):
    """
    x : Please get a variable 
    
    return: get lower_limit
    """
    Q1 = x.quantile(0.25)
    Q3 = x.quantile(0.75)
    IQR = 1.5 * (Q3 - Q1)
    
    lower_limit = Q1 - IQR
    
    return lower_limit
